00026 #include <l4/sys/compiler.h>
00027 #include <l4/sys/l4int.h>

00029 struct l4_kip_platform_info
00030 {
00031   char name[16];
00032 };
00033 
00034 #if L4_MWORD_BITS == 32
00035 #  include <l4/sys/__kip-32bit.h>
00036 #else
00037 #  include <l4/sys/__kip-64bit.h>
00038 #endif

00054 enum l4_kernel_info_consts_t
00055 {
00056   L4_KIP_VERSION_FIASCO      = 0x87004444,
00057   L4_KIP_VERSION_FIASCO_MASK = 0xff00ffff,
00058 };
00059 
00063 #define L4_KERNEL_INFO_MAGIC (0x4BE6344CL) /* "L4µK" */
00064 
00065 
00071 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t l4_kip_version(l4_kernel_info_t *kip) L4_NOTHROW;
00072 
00078 L4_INLINE const char *l4_kip_version_string(l4_kernel_info_t *kip) L4_NOTHROW;
00079 
00088 L4_INLINE int
00089 l4_kernel_info_version_offset(l4_kernel_info_t *kip) L4_NOTHROW;
00090 
00093 /*************************************************************************
00094  * Implementations
00095  *************************************************************************/
00096 
00097 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00098 l4_kip_version(l4_kernel_info_t *kip) L4_NOTHROW
00099 { return kip->version & L4_KIP_VERSION_FIASCO_MASK; }
00100 
00101 L4_INLINE const char*
00102 l4_kip_version_string(l4_kernel_info_t *k) L4_NOTHROW
00103 { return (const char *)k + l4_kernel_info_version_offset(k); }
00104 
00105 L4_INLINE int
00106 l4_kernel_info_version_offset(l4_kernel_info_t *kip) L4_NOTHROW
00107 { return kip->offset_version_strings << 4; }
